frontmatter.title: Raspberry PI: A PC for My Son - Part 2
frontmatter.description: Helping my son to setup Raspberry PI - solving problem in previous part on family link.

frontmatter.title: Raspberry PI: A PC for My Son
frontmatter.description: I wanted to help my son to manage his time better, expose him on technology and let him discover anything related to tech himself in a controlled environment. I have a few options, but ultimately, I am experimenting with Raspberry PI setup first. This post is to share my considered options and the challenges I faced.
